ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Campbell J. Miller ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. CAMPBELL J. MILLER, a judge of the Tax Court of Canada, effective Aprill 30, 2019.
